Original: 啤酒有點貴，但這是一家位於很酷地帶的很酷的酒吧。  經營這個地方的女士琳達非常好。  這個地方只在晚上開放，週日除外，週日全天開放，他們提供一些菲律賓美食。  很酷的地方。  哦對了，還有卡拉OK
EN: Beer is a bit expensive, but this is a cool bar in a cool area.Lada, who runs this place, is very good.This place is only open at night, except for Sunday, and open all day on Sunday. They provide some Philippine cuisine.Very cool place.Oh yes, there is karaoke
